title: First Trailer To ‘Tales From The Crypt’ Reboot Is Finally Here And It’s Awesome
text:
First Trailer To ‘Tales From The Crypt’ Reboot Is Finally Here And It’s Awesome This is going to be good. Feb 27th, 2017 Photo: YouTube 
Tales From The Crypt was an awesome horror anthology series that ran on HBO from 1989 to 1996 — you know, before American Horror Story did it. It was like Are You Afraid Of The Dark , but for grownups, and while I wasn’t really allowed to watch it when I was young, I did discover it as I got older, and oh boy was it perfect. 
And now, thanks to M. Night Shyamalan and TNT, that Crypt Keeper is back to narrate and tell scary and creepy as all hell stories. Now while it probably won’t be as super dark and graphic as it once was when it was on HBO, you can expect it to still be scary on its new network. 
Check out the first teaser trailer below. First Trailer To ‘Tales From The Crypt’ Reboot Is Finally Here And It’s Awesome 
Shyamalan has rebounded with The Visit and the fantastic Split , so I’m hopeful this will be great. You can keep an eye out for this one as it will be coming at you sometime this year. 
And now let’s take a look at the original intro to Tales From The Crypt .
